表单

高级表单筛选

使用是需要再表单最外层添加.advance-search-filter样式和advance-filter属性

            <div class="advance-search-filter" advance-filter>
                <form class="form-horizontal">
                    <fieldset>
                        第一个form
                        ......
                    </fieldset>
                    <fieldset>
                        第二个form
                        ......
                        <div class="form-actions">
                            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">提交</button>
                            <button data-class="J_closeFilterBtn" type="button" class="btn">关闭</button>
                        </div>
                    </fieldset>
                </form>
            </div>

水平表单

状态提示信息 帮助信息

label提示信息给label添加label-state="labelState.title"

$scope.labelState:{{ labelState| json }}
                <form class="form-horizontal">
                    <fieldset>
                        <div class="control-group">
                            <label class="control-label" for="inputEmail">文字区域</label>
                            <div class="controls">
                                <input type="text" placeholder="Email">
                                <span class="help-inline">状态提示信息</span>
                                <span class="help-block">帮助信息</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        ...
                    </fieldset>
                </form>

两栏表单

状态提示信息 帮助信息
状态提示信息 帮助信息 
                <form class="form-horizontal">
                    <div class="form-column">
                        <fieldset>
                            表单内容
                        </fieldset>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-column">
                        <fieldset>
                            表单内容
                        </fieldset>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-actions">
                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">保存</button>
                        <button type="button" class="btn">取消</button>
                    </div>
                </form>

                <form class="form-inline">
                    ...
                </form>

分组表单

分组标题一
分组标题二 
                <form class="form-horizontal">
                    <fieldset>
                        <legend>分组标题一</legend>
                        ...
                    </fieldset>
                    <fieldset>
                        <legend>分组标题二</legend>
                        ...
                    </fieldset>
                </form>

表单提示信息

Bootstrap包含了（错误）error、（警告）warning、（通知）info和（成功）success信息的样式。为.control-group添加适当的属性即可使用这些样式。

Something may have gone wrong
Please correct the error
Username is taken
Woohoo! 
                <form class="form-horizontal">
                    <div class="control-group warning">
                        <label class="control-label" for="inputWarning">Input with warning</label>
                        <div class="controls">
                            <input type="text" id="inputWarning">
                            <span class="help-inline">Something may have gone wrong</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="control-group error">
                       <label class="control-label" for="inputError">Input with error</label>
                       <div class="controls">
                           <input type="text" id="inputError">
                           <span class="help-inline">Please correct the error</span>
                       </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="control-group info">
                        <label class="control-label" for="inputInfo">Input with info</label>
                        <div class="controls">
                            <input type="text" id="inputInfo">
                            <span class="help-inline">Username is taken</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="control-group success">
                        <label class="control-label" for="inputSuccess">Input with success</label>
                        <div class="controls">
                            <input type="text" id="inputSuccess">
                            <span class="help-inline">Woohoo!</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </form>

信息提示

  • 多行提示信息
  • 邮箱格式不正确
  • 你输入的密码有误
  • 邮编格式不正确
错误信息
警告信息
成功信息
信息 
                    <div class="alert fade in alert-error"  bs-alert>
                        <ul>
                            <li>多行提示信息</li>
                            <li>邮箱格式不正确</li>
                            <li>你输入的密码有误</li>
                            <li>邮编格式不正确</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="alert fade in alert-error"  bs-alert>
                        错误信息
                    </div>
                    <div class="alert fade in alert-warnning"  bs-alert>
                        警告信息
                    </div>
                    <div class="alert fade in alert-success"  bs-alert>
                        成功信息
                    </div>
                    <div class="alert fade in alert-info"  bs-alert>
                        信息
                    </div>
Something may have gone wrong 
                    <div class="control-group warning">
                        <label class="control-label" for="inputWarning">Input with warning</label>
                        <div class="controls">
                            <input type="text" id="inputWarning">
                            <span class="help-inline">Something may have gone wrong</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
Please correct the error 
                    <div class="control-group error">
                        <label class="control-label" for="inputError">Input with error</label>
                        <div class="controls">
                            <input type="text" id="inputError">
                            <span class="help-inline">Please correct the error</span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
Username is already taken 
                    <div class="control-group info">
                        <label class="control-label" for="inputInfo">Input with info</label>
                        <div class="controls">
                            <input type="text" id="inputInfo">
                            <span class="help-inline">Username is already taken</span>
                         </div>
                    </div>
Woohoo! 
                    <div class="control-group success">
                        <label class="control-label" for="inputSuccess">Input with success</label>
                        <div class="controls">
                            <input type="text" id="inputSuccess">
                            <span class="help-inline">Woohoo!</span>
                         </div>
                    </div>

表单长度

                <form>
                    <fieldset>
                        <div class="controls">
                            <input class="span5" type="text" placeholder=".span5">
                        </div>
                        <div class="controls controls-row">
                            <input class="span4" type="text" placeholder=".span4">
                            <input class="span1" type="text" placeholder=".span1">
                        </div>
                        <div class="controls controls-row">
                            <input class="span3" type="text" placeholder=".span3">
                            <input class="span2" type="text" placeholder=".span2">
                        </div>
                        <div class="controls controls-row">
                            <input class="span2" type="text" placeholder=".span2">
                            <input class="span3" type="text" placeholder=".span3">
                        </div>
                        <div class="controls controls-row">
                            <input class="span1" type="text" placeholder=".span1">
                            <input class="span4" type="text" placeholder=".span4">
                        </div>
                    </fieldset>
                </form>
            
                <form>
                    <div class="controls docs-input-sizes">
                        <input class="input-mini" type="text" placeholder=".input-mini">
                        <input class="input-small" type="text" placeholder=".input-small">
                        <input class="input-medium" type="text" placeholder=".input-medium">
                        <input class="input-large" type="text" placeholder=".input-large">
                        <input class="input-xlarge" type="text" placeholder=".input-xlarge">
                        <input class="input-xxlarge" type="text" placeholder=".input-xxlarge">
                    </div>
                </form>
